this_title: My Brothers and Sisters in the North
trans_title: Meine Brüder und Schwestern im Norden(德)
introduction: The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is a country with a very strong social cohesion and the unprecedented admiration of the people for their leader, which is absolutely unique and incomprehensible especially from a Western point of view. The native Korean director Sung-Hyung Cho tries to understand this by accompanying several Koreans from different backgrounds in their d...
foreign_title: My Brothers and Sisters in the North
